pr_title: Add matrix support to client-side form binding

timeline.message: Enable passing value model arguments in ArrayModel
Generate simple ObjectModel for map properties
Add test for matrix in ArrayModel
Add test for matrix in ArrayModel

timeline.bodyText: Moved appending the "Model" here, since it was repeated for every call of this method.
timeline.author: platosha

timeline.bodyText:
MyEntity[][] selfMatrix fails the build with
Type 'ArrayModel<unknown, AbstractModel<any>>' is not assignable to type 'ArrayModel<any, MyEntityModel<MyEntity>>'
What can we do about it? I'm OK if it's not usable in form binding, but I would like it to compile.
timeline.author: vlukashov

timeline.message: Add support for matrices of objects
Rename Model ArrayModel argument to ItemModel
